website_summaries.verdict: These strips are a great value as 150 come in a bottle and they have a 90-day shelf life once the package is opened.
pros: Packaging includes instructions and information about expected results based on health concerns and diet
Color indicators are easy to decipher
Strips pick up secondary ketones better than other test strip brands
cons: Some colors don’t match up with colors printed on bottle guide

customer_reviews.title: in 90%  the ketone strips from Nurse Hatty were accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I did tested the accuracy of this ketone strips for a couple of weeks, I measured the ketone level in my blood as well in the same time. Most of the time, I would say, in 90%, the ketone strips from Nurse Hatty were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: If they don’t work for us, they don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Either we got a defective batch or these are totally bogus because neither my husband or I can get the color to change at all. I fast 20 - 30 hours non Keto and am losing weight. He is 8 percent body fat, strict Keto for ten years and fasts 18/6. There is something wrong with the strips if neither one of us can get the strips to even show the slightest change at the very end of our fasts!
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Seems inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: These things were a waste of money. Although they're cheap they are inaccurate. I have a blood ketone monitor & I compared results between the two. At one point the blood monitor read a 2.1 & the strips gave me a 4.0 then another test gave me a 2.3 blood & a 12.0 strip. I'm more inclined to believe the blood tests were giving a closer to correct result. Maybe I just got a bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Jaymes

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: I know I have to be in ketosis based on my weight loss and generally feeling great. I meet my macros everyday. These strips NEVER show anything. No change whatsoever. Don't waste your money like I did! **UPDATE** Bought a blood meter. I AM in ketosis!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Why all the pink?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help confirm that I was in ketosis during my ketogenic diet. The strips seem to work okay, turning pink as expected. However, the all pink color chart on the bottle makes it very hard to distinguish between the levels of ketosis. I'm sure it varies from user to user due to one's own color perception, but I really can't tell the difference between any of the pinks in the middle row of the color chart.
customer_reviews.author: LarsenB

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money!
customer_reviews.text: These Ketone strips didn't work at all. I knew I was in ketosis and another test strip and blood test confirmed this, but the Nurse Hatty Ketone Strips came up negative. I should've saved myself the frustration, time & money. I got zero customer service from the company who makes the strips.
customer_reviews.author: CAV

customer_reviews.title: Good Strips Sometimes Hard To Judge Results
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly these are the first keto strips I've ever used. They work fairly well, but the color gradations can sometimes be tough and I found they work best with a good amount of urine on them for testing. Too little and the "reading" doesn't seem to be as clear. They show results in 40 seconds and they give you 150 strips, which is nice as it provides for more frequent testing. These are a good product, I just wish the color gradations were a bit more clear.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: really wanted to like these..
customer_reviews.text: I like your FB Page and videos and I appreciate the literature that accompanied these strips and found the information useful... Opened bottle for the first time about 10 days ago. First strip showed a very slight color difference compared to negative.. Since then I have had no change in color on any strip. I went back and used strips from a bottle of a different brand, that is getting close to it's expiration date and they still show a significant color change. I have been faithfully sticking to an under 25 carb per day diet for 6 months now.. So my conclusion is. These strips just don't work for me or I received a bad jar..
customer_reviews.author: phil j schneider

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: They work and are super helpful!(: anyone who has written a bad review because they weren’t accurate was probably because they’re mad that they said negative. Lol but they definitely work!
customer_reviews.author: Alexas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered these a couple weeks ago and I have been on a keto diet for three weeks. I can never get the color to change on these. I am not sure why they are not working as I am following a strict diet of low carbs and I am losing weight. I would not recommend using these. I am going to have to go to the store and get some from CVS or Walgreens. These are a waste! I thought the positive reviews meant they would work well. My aunt bought some in a store along with my cousin and Both of theirs work. Buy other ones!
customer_reviews.author: Elledee33

customer_reviews.title: THESE KETONE STRIPS RULE
customer_reviews.text: These ketone strips are very high-quality. My husband and I had another brand that may have been getting old, and that other brand seemed inaccurate; we were never confident of whether we were in a state of ketosis or not. But once we used Nurse Hatty's ketone strips, we could see the difference. The results showed up very quickly and clearly. Also, the color guide (I don't know what to call it...where you match up your result to the percentage of ketosis that your body is in), printed on the side of the container, is large, and easy to read. The strips are longer than the other brand too.The product arrived very quickly, also. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using these since I started Keto 11 months ago.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these 3 times so far since starting Keto. I remember Thomas Delauer a Youtuber, that after a few months that you don't register on the strips. Well I purchased a Keto blood test monitor because of that, and after 3 months of being on Keto, I found wasn't worth it. I went back to the strips after my Doctor told me he saw Ketones in my urine sample. I purchased another bottle of the urine strips, still register and works well. Better than paying $45.00 for blood test strips.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: It definitely works (Keto newb here)
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/12: this stuff is ridiculously accurate. We’ve been tinkering with our diet and with each tweak, the strips are sensitive enough to pick it up. See new photo: left, no ketosis; right, ketosis. ..... Just started Keto and thought we’d give this a try. The first one I tried on day 1 was pale yellow—accurate. I’m over a week in and have stuck with the diet strictly, and today’s stick is purple. (See photo.) The test results have fluctuated a few times between the start of Keto and now, but always seem to accurately depict what I feel my ketone leaves should be at, based on how I ate that day. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RubyTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty stoke when I tried these the first time and it told me I was pretty deep into ketosis. But, when my boyfriend tried them and it said the same thing (and he's not doing keto AT ALL), I was pretty disappointed. One day they tell me I have no trace of ketones, the next day it says I'm really deep in ketosis. I gave them to my friend to try (who has also been doing keto for over 6 months) and it did the same thing to her. Clearly not accurate at all and a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been keto for over a month tested with my daughter that is totally not doing keto we had the same results .
customer_reviews.author: Lenora B .

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I was running out of my previous test strips (different brand). After trying these simultaneous with my old brand, these never changed colors. My old brand still worked just fine, and shows that I have ketones in my urine. These won’t detect at all. My Husband also tried and same thing. I wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in March 2018, By Jan 2019, they had turned grey/black, and no longer worked. Were kept in the container, tightly closed, with the desiccant inside, as instructed. Expiration is July 2020. Should have lasted much longer
customer_reviews.author: R. Long

customer_reviews.title: EPIC FAIL
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a total water fast for 9 days. Can't tell it by the Keto strips! They will NOT change color! Tried it on another 6 day water fast I did a few months ago, and it was the same thing. I chose these to order because of the great amount of good reviews (I like to get 4.5 to 5 stars on things I buy) and thought these would be fine. I have used seveal other brands in the past and NEVER had this problem at all! Threw the bottle away today. So totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: feemeister

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: I went by reviews on this and was excited since i have been on the keto dier for a month. First day didn't see a change so figured its because i used it later in the day. Yesterday morning i tested myself 1st thing and got a moderate reading. Today again 1st thing in the morning and it red negative and i know i had no to very little carbs as a matter of fact my carb intake was under 10% since i keep track of what i eat. So my conclusion this does NOT work accurately and very disappointed 😒 I wasted my money on this. Wish I could get a refund 😕
customer_reviews.author: M-Rod

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for me
customer_reviews.text: These strips work for me. When I'm not in ketosis, it doesn't change color & when I am in ketosis, it turns a darker color. I don't have a blood monitor to compare the results, but I can tell when I'm in ketosis by the metallic taste in my mouth. When I have the metallic taste in my mouth, the strips turn darker. When I've just eaten & use the strips, I show no change in color. I keep the container tightly sealed & store it in my bedroom, not the bathroom. I've been using them for 1.5-2 weeks. They are very easy to use. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Judski

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Lots of strips. Amazing price (used to buy them at CVS for $20!) They read very quickly and the tips and outreach from "nurse Hattie" is very nice. Makes you feel like if you have any problems or questions someone is there. I don't think you can really have a problem with urine test strips but it's still nice to know she/they care so much about such a product. I love that there are o many. I can test every time I pee lol and not feel stressed out about using too many or running out cause I can but more for a great price super fast again on Amazon! Get em - they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-45-in Cali

customer_reviews.title: Works well but some strips only read partially
customer_reviews.text: I eat a ketogenic diet and use these to see how I'm doing with my carbs. I have found that although these work well, some of the strips don't seem to have as much of the reagent as others; even when completely covered with urine only one spot on the pad will turn color. It's enough to see what you are registering but it must be a manufacturing problem. Some days I wonder if I actually ate too many carbs or is the strip faulty, so I use another one. Usually it's me at fault. Glad there are so many strips in the bottle! At any rate, these do work well to see if you are in ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: Judi W

customer_reviews.title: Useful product
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a Keto diet and wanted to know if I was in ketosis. As I have no secondary test for ketosis, I really cannot tell for sure that the strips are accurate, but they are fairly easy to use. Just get a urine sample (works best in a cup which I WISH WAS INCLUDED!), dip strip in and compare color to those on the container. My first test showed no ketosis, but a few days later the color changed and has consistently since then. I feel the product was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with the strips thus far. Nurse Hatty does an exceptional job emailing you with important information on how to use & store which is very important. She makes herself available if you have an questions. The air will affect the coloring on the test strip but I have confirmed they still work. I've tested against others in my household that are eating regular foods & sugar & there's always test negative. Where mine & my daughters always test very high. You do get a lot so I'm using them all the time since they only last 3 months anyways. The price was fair & I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These definitely work for me. Normally when I start a keto cycle it takes me roughly 2 full days to get into ketosis and after I do, I get various colors of pink through burgundy. Normally the amount of ketones in urine, if you are in ketosis, is determined by the rate at which your body is converting fat into ketones and how fast you are burning them. If you are exercising regularly while in ketosis, the amount of ketones in your urine may decrease because you are using more of them but it does not mean you are out of ketosis. I think these strips are great and they help to keep me motivated and on track.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last even close to the expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product. I used it while I was dieting. My mom passed away and I stopped dieting. I’ve started again and so I pulled out my strips. I looked at the date to make sure that they were still good. I thought they would be because I’ve stored them in a cool place I kept them in a dark place I did exactly like I was told. The expiration date is November 2020. I would expect them to at least be good until then. They are not. They turned. They are no good. I kind of feel like I should tell you that they don’t last. It was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McCord

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are only a fraction of the cost of competitors. One small issue: because there are so many in the canister, if they aren’t used quickly enough the strips lose their potency. My husband & I were registering in ‘trace’ for over a month; got a new batch & bam—both consistently in ‘moderate’. We tested them side by side. Easy fix; put half in a ziplock upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great... highly sensitive & accurate...
customer_reviews.text: Highly sensitive test! This product is the bomb for people checking their ketones levels! 150 long strips of 7.7% sodium nitroprusside makes for a very sensitive and diet reinforcing affirmation of ketosis and a clear color spectrum against a WHITE back ground on the label also let's you clearly know when you haven't yet reached a state of ketosis (the neutral pale beige reading on the ketostrip). I would highly recommend this product and will recommend it to family, friends, and clients. P Sledd
customer_reviews.author: P Sledd

customer_reviews.title: These don’t work!
customer_reviews.text: These strips do not work!! I was eating less than 20 carbs per day and losing weight. The ketones strips would barely change color. They also went bad WAY before the expiration date. They all turned dark in the bottle. I stored them as recommended in a cool dark place and always tightened the lid immediately after removing a stick. These strips are a complete waste of money. I will not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: doodisrae

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money- it’s doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my keto diet. This is not the brand I have used before but the lower price motivated me to try it. Recently I decided to use the strips and get rid of my older urine strips. To my shock, this strips didn’t work- didn’t even change color. My older strip had was more accurate and I sorry I trashed them before opening these ones. Well they are not worth returning and I guess I will be going back to another brand:(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other brand.
customer_reviews.text: Last time I ordered ketosis test strips I ordered from another popular brand on Amazon and these are much better. Here are the reasons why: 1. Longer strip size so you can easily hold them under your "stream" 2. The color indicators are easier to match with the bottle 3. Less expensive I've only had mine for 3 days so I'll update the review if they do not last up to their expiration date 3 months after opening, but so far I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Shootsie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why there are bad reviews for this at all. I do keto Every couple of months and everyone who does keto knows that the test strips expire after like six months so I bought these because I had just started keto again and they were extremely accurate I love this so much I’m going to continue purchasing these every time I guarantee yevery couple of months and everyone who does keto knows that the test strips expire after like six months so I bought these because I had just started keto again and they were extremely accurate I love this so much I’m going to continue purchasing these every time I get on keto.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great to use for keto diet
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand better than others I've used. It seems to hold up well in a liquid environment....to be polite about it :) It seems to be accurate. You need to know that blood ketones don't match numbers for urine ketones.....different metabolism mechanisms BUT it will tell you if you're in or out of ketosis, and how much, relatively speaking, ketones you're producing. You'll most likely see a lot of ketones after a strenuous workout but little to none after consuming decent amounts of carbs, so keep that in mind. But great product and valuable for ketosis monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkererguy

customer_reviews.title: Best brand I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Great strips, comes with a lot of them and the customer service (emails educating before and after) is top notch. I will stick with this brand and I have tried four brands total. The only thing I would change is that it would come with a urine cup to dip the stick in so I didn’t have to find something to use for my pee. Not a huge deal but would make this product 100% everything you could ever ask for in keto strips
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Honest Non-Sponsored Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought these strips because I started the “Keto” diet and wanted to track to see if I was in ketosis. 1. The instructions were easy to read and interpret. 2. The results come within 30 seconds. 3. The results are accurate. I tested these to see if the results were accurate. I used a strip when I was very strict and limiting my carbs to 20 a day and it read moderate ketones. Then I tried it after having upwards of 70 carbs the day prior and it read trace to no amount of ketones. All in all i am pleased with these strips. The results come quickly and accurately. The directions are easy to follow and interpret.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking product, unfortunately does not work!
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use, and supposed to easy to read, however the bottle I've got does not work. Not for me, and not for my husband. The lid seems to be compromised from the very beginning . The strips came already slightly colored pink ( are they supposed to be colored before I used them? I did not find the answer to this question anywhere) I followed the instructions having them opened and keeping them in a safe place( not in the bathroom). I have been on keto already for several months with daily IF , and had a big hopes for the stripes to use them for me and my husbands. Unfortunately I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Babushka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and read
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and the color chart on the bottle makes them easy to read. My only thing I'm experiencing currently is that for every test I've done (approx 20 at different times of day over last two weeks), have all read the same (second to highest reading), so although I'd like to think Im in a permanent state of ketosis I'll give 5 stars once I've seen a change in reading.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Item works as described.
customer_reviews.text: My brother gave me a set of Ketosis strips from another manufacturer he had that were unused from like a few months ago. The color kept staying the same. Unbeknownst to us that these things have a short shelf life. After reading reviews and viewing the various choices I decided on Nurse Hatty. A few minutes after I got these strips I opened it up and peed in a plastic cup and dipped the test strip in the cup. Within 10 seconds it changed colors showing I was in moderate Ketosis. The color matches pretty well with the bottle. This product works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Yu

customer_reviews.title: Which is  it?
customer_reviews.text: Got two different results on the same strip. Would steer clear of this item
customer_reviews.author: MQOH

customer_reviews.title: I compared Nurse Hatty & Smackfast Ketone testing strips. (Nurse Hatty wins)
customer_reviews.text: I bought a package of Nurse Hatty and a package of Smackfat ketone testing strips. I already had the trips that I bought at my local drugstore. I wanted to compare. so you don't have to!) All 3 worked just fine. I like the Nurse hat ones best because they are more sensitive and measure the tiniest increase or decrease in ketones. I would not say anything bad about the 3 that I have, but I prefer Nurse Hatty Ketone strips. Smackfast has a Facebook page and website that encourages you to stay low carb. So, buy either, whichever is on sale. GOOD LUCK!
customer_reviews.author: nannychick

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands of keto strips, and these worked the best. It's nice to know that I can count on them to tell me the truth. I do keto for health reasons, and it's really important to monitor what "fuel" I'm burning so I can avoid blood sugar problems. (I've battled reactive hypoglycemia almost my whole life, and keto is the only thing that manages it for me.)
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand that was more expensive. Bought them from Walmart and since they cartied only one brand (Slimfast) I hot them. Hadnt used ketone strips that much before but was annoyed that it seemed that some of the strips worked and some didnt. Nurse Hatty strips were much better priced, longer, and seemed fresher becauae even tjough you need to wait 40 seconds the strip woukd turn immediately. Will definitely buy again. I love the inswrt and read it fully. I like Nurse Hatty 😉👍
customer_reviews.author: DJ Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: In 20 years, the best keto strips I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I am on a keto diet plan and use Nurse Hatty Keto Strips exclusively to keep track of the level of ketosis I'm in. I really like her product because the strips are longer than most, are accurate and easy to use. The instructions are very user friendly, and the bottle has a lid that gives an extra click so you know it is closed correctly. I have used keto strips off and on over the past 20 years, and Nurse Hatty's are by far the best I've used. Thank you for an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Sari

customer_reviews.title: Great test kit, great price
customer_reviews.text: I've just started the keto diet and wanted to make sure that I'm staying in ketosis. I've never used another brand but these seem to work fine. I asked other people who are not on the diet to try them out and they all got negative readings. I got as positive reading and throughout the week the colour started gradually getting darker. So they seem really accurate. I'm impressed and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: These never did accurately register the amount of ketones in my urine. Continuously read negative.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use - Easy to Read
customer_reviews.text: After eating clean for a couple months, husband and I began a Keto lifestyle a couple weeks ago. We purchased these so we could tell when our bodies were transitioning into Ketosis. They are great! You can also tell when you transition out of ketosis if you fall off the wagon. Hopefully, we won't need them for that! Ha! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PatsyE

customer_reviews.title: Review + "Hack"
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate, love these strips. I will say, do use these before their expiration because they really do lose their ability to accurately detect Ketones. Also, definitely don't leave the bottle open for any extended amount of time, they'll also lose their potency. I've made both mistakes. "HACK" - when you get them, cut them in half, vertically, with a sterile blade (scissors, paper cutter) and presto, you now have double. Once again, they'll say it'll contaminate etc and not be accurate. It makes orders take twice as long, losing money for the company, but it's worked fine for me. You do you and make your own decisions. All the best your way. Happy Keto!
customer_reviews.author: Banger

customer_reviews.title: Reliable sticks
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for me. I tested them when I ate a bit of carbs and when I was only on keto. It definitely showed the difference. REally reliable read. So good, I bought another can of them! So far, I'm 16.5 pounds down and these sticks have helped me learn what food works with my body and what doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: DePlume

customer_reviews.title: They work great until your body is fat adapted.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I used them for four weeks with no issues. The fifth week, they kept showing no ketones to trace ketones. I was incredibly confused because I hadn’t changed my diet. I talked to my Facebook group and they told me that after 4-6 weeks, your body starts using the ketones to burn fat and I am now “fat adapted”. I wish I had known that in the beginning! It was great when I first started keto but I didn’t need nearly as many as I have!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Moss

customer_reviews.title: Good product to test for Ketosis.
customer_reviews.text: I have tested these for a couple weeks and find them to be as accurate as a test strip can be. I’ve checked at various times with changing results as expected based on things like carb consumption, fasting and hydration. These color legend or key on the side of the bottle are distinct enough to make comparisons on the test strip easier. Some tests strips have the colors too close in hue to make them readable. While the instructions say to wait 40 seconds for final results, the test strip seems to begin to change immediately so you know right away if you are if there are ketones present. Waiting 40 seconds will then give you your level.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us...
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for us. I bought 2 bottles (1 for me and 1 for my mother in law) We both are doing the keto diet, but the strip doesn't ever read anything other than no ketones. I could understand that before I started the diet, but after being on it a week, and my mother in law longer than that, I would expect it to have changed a little bit. I asked my mother in law today if hers worked, and she said hers aren't changing either. I must have gotten a bad batch because after reading all of the positive reviews, I thought this would have been a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to try the strip and my result after one day was shown that I was in Ketosis. I reached out to Nurse Hatty customer service team. They clarified my questions in a timely manner. The answers were satisfactory. I compared my husband's result (not currently on Keto diet) and my result (been on for a day). The strips work great and easy to read the results.
customer_reviews.author: Slita

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. Every single one was the deepest purple which really worried me. I want to be in ketosis, but not in ketoacidosis, which each strip said I was. I wasn't having any symptoms, so I wasn't worried, just curious. I ended up ordering a blood tester which showed a normal level of ketones ranging from 1 to 3.6, nowhere near the levels these strips show. So, if you just want to know if there's ketones, then this is the bargain basement way to do it. Just no accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Amy

customer_reviews.title: Especially if you’re like me and constantly need reassurance that you are in ...
customer_reviews.text: These work as advertised. Being in the KETOGENIC diet, these are a must have. Especially if you’re like me and constantly need reassurance that you are in ketosis. These are a bargain considering chain pharmacy stores will run you $5+ what these costs. If you’re a prime member this is a no brainer. But to be honest I have notice that about 1 in every 25 sticks I come across a dud that, which is not a horrible conversion rate. All in all this is a great bang for your buck and definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: z1402

customer_reviews.title: What an easy-to-use product!
customer_reviews.text: When I started the keto lifestyle and bought the strips I was skeptical at first use, but the days went on and I could witness the change in color within a couple of seconds, they're awesome!!! This product is not only a great one but it also has an excellent communication and follow up with seller, if you have a question the answer is immediately and is not an automated answer which is much appreciated now a days. Thank you nurse Hatty!!
customer_reviews.author: GABRIELA D.

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to use
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I bought this based on the reviews and I'm not disappointed. I started the keto diet to lose weight and these strips are so important in helping me stay on track. I can't vouch for the accuracy like others, but I can say these are super easy to use right out of the box and the results are so simple to read. The strips are long enough that I just dip them in my urine stream, so no need for a cup or anything else. And less than 45 seconds later, I have my results. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader 9876

customer_reviews.title: Accurate & Super Simple!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using ketone strips but I'm glad I chose these. They're very simple to read, super quick to use, and have shown me very consistent readings that seem to line up perfectly with what I'm eating that day. Has been very helpful for following the Keto diet. It's very motivating to see that you're in ketosis and I have lost 6 pounds in my first week. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: brigit

customer_reviews.title: Possibly Defective Batch
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a newbie to Atkins dieting so I understand the induction phase entirely. I've used prefer brands and they've all worked. I tried this brand and got no tests--no ketosis, even after 2 weeks of strict 85/15 fat to carbs. I totally understand that others have had great success using these strips but I haven't. I'm guessing, like others that have given 1-star review, that mine were defective. Spend a couple bucks more and get a decent brand.
customer_reviews.author: CA-SATX

customer_reviews.title: They Really Work
customer_reviews.text: I started the Keto diet and bought these more out of interest than anything else. I went into Ketosis early on and the strips confirmed that I was there. I had to quit the diet for health reasons and as soon as I did, the strips confirmed that as well. Good product for testing.
customer_reviews.author: bop

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my test strips! They actually really work. I’ve been doing the keto diet and just never know if I was getting into ketosis but with these strips I know where I am from a slight detection in my urine to full on ketosis! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: pjd

customer_reviews.title: Anyone on keto should have these
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been doing keto for 3 weeks now and these are really handy to have. Whenever I’m feeling sick- one pee test will tell me how high my ketosis levels are and I know if I need to add more salt or vitamins to my diet. These are a great way to monitor your levels to make sure you aren’t in a dangerous zone with the keto diet but also keep on track!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: True to Scale
customer_reviews.text: With other test strips, I've been left wondering whether it was really this reading or that but with these strips, just do the test, time the 40 seconds and you have an answer, no wondering was my count too long, not long enough, is that really link pink or the shade darker, etc. Hopefully I'll never have to buy another brand because these just work so well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Doubt accuracy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these work at all, no matter what I eat, I get the same test results. Doesn’t matter if I eat very low carb (<20) and low protein (for week+ with keto flu symptoms), to eating a pancake, same test results show I’m in low ketosis. Has anyone gotten a different reading?
customer_reviews.author: Ryal

customer_reviews.title: Loving these strips
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a new keto diet and I was a little scared about eating such high fat and not knowing if I was in ketosis or not. I read about the strips online and found them for an amazing price on Amazon so I thought I'll try them. So far money well spent. I was able to find out immediately that I was in ketosis and have been able to make sure I'm staying in ketosis. No more guessing for me.
customer_reviews.author: ccarsten97

customer_reviews.title: Leaves no doubt
customer_reviews.text: Helped me see just how fast I go into ketosis. I had to slow it up a bit because my keto diet was super strict really quickly. I am so glad I got these strips or I might have hurt myself. I highly recommend yhem. Use first thing in the morning before eating or drinking for best results. Stay safe and listen to your body. :)
customer_reviews.author: allfaith

customer_reviews.title: Simple and accurate tool to help you on your Keto journey.
customer_reviews.text: There strips were quick and simple to use. Gave me a good indication of where my body is at with regards to being in ketosis. It’s motivating to know that my body is burning fat rather than storing. Seeing my weight drop on the scale encourages me to keep up with the Keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: TTT

customer_reviews.title: keto sticks for dieting
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. You need to put them against a light background though if you have old eyes like me as you can see the true color better. No issue for me just put it against the tub wall and the color pops right out. Helpful if you are on a carb low diet to make sure you are doing ok. I like these as you can just urinate on them and they work no need to get a container and all the fuss. All my sticks are good and I don't store them in the bathroom so they stay that way.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia C. Longacre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! These are extra long, super easy to use and have more accurate levels. They even sent a super helpful email about product usage and tips. I loved them so much I immediately ordered a second bottle. My Dr. Loves that I've been able to keep such close track.
customer_reviews.author: K's Curls

customer_reviews.title: Works how it should
customer_reviews.text: Works as it is supposed to. As for accuracy I have no blood meter so no way to really test... HOWEVER... when I drink little amounts of liquid and don't eat carbs for a few days the darker the strip becomes vs when I drink losts of water and no carb for a few days it will be something lighter but still apparent so that's good... I would absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Charlsey Oft

customer_reviews.title: Totally inaccurate- AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this multiple times. The first time, years ago, these were great. The last few times - totally inaccurate. I’m talking, 48 hour fast whilst being under 50 grams of carbs for months, and still no reading. Tested against other strips + logic. This is the second bottle it’s happened with, so this is the last time I’ll be trying this brand. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Miss

customer_reviews.title: Effective tool for tracking ketosis
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband, whose physician recommended he try a keto diet. We wanted to be sure that the changes he made were effective, and these strips help him keep track of where he's at, so he's aware of any necessary adjustments. So far he's had no issues with them, and feels they're an effective tool on his fat-burning journey.
customer_reviews.author: Phlegbhe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keto strips
customer_reviews.text: These are quick and easy to use and read. Do not store in your bathroom, make sure they are stored in a dry area and you will have no problems with longevity! I have had zero issues with reading my results or them going bad before the three month shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Akiko

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to confirm ketosis as I’ve been eating a ketogenic diet for about 10 days now. These strips worked! Indicated a high level of ketones... i also had a day where I ate a little more carbs than usual and the strips showed a difference... lower ketone levels, which is what I would expect. Pretty happy having confirmation that my diet is working and my body is using up fat! Strips themselves are good length for testing, sturdy and well made, don’t disintegrate when wet as they are plastic not paper.
customer_reviews.author: ErinE

customer_reviews.title: These are high quality strips  with high quality customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would rather there were only 15 second readings but I am happy with this product It keeps me on track and the price is real good and the quality is great Well I haven't found a better quality product They stand behind what they sell If you delete the email they will send you another pdf Also I must add they are made in the US of A So that is a selling point for me
customer_reviews.author: Fredia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nurse Hatty Cares
customer_reviews.text: The product works perfectly as describe, but what really was impressive was the additional information that came with it and the follow-up emails (only two) with the chance to ask questions. All the information necessary to use for a ketogenic diet was provided in detail. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Casalinda

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone
customer_reviews.text: It works. Just pee on the stick and compare the strip to the guide to read your levels. If you can't pee on a little stick than this is probably not for you. Side note: Apparently these can be entertainment for young kids as well. Since they are kept in the bathroom near the toilet, for obvious reasons, my son thought he'd check his levels often. He's yet to be in ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Young

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonder. I use this daily to monitor my ketone levels and I can vouch for its accuracy. I went off of keto when I went on vacation and sure enough when I checked my urine, it was very pale pink.. then I went back to my keto diet and tested again after two weeks and saw deep purple color when tested.
customer_reviews.author: TrustedAmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and accuracy, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my keto diet and I don't have anything to compare it with, but strictly following a keto diet, I believe it works. When I first started, strips showed up negative, but as I started ketone levels started to rise. I used maybe 4-5 strips per days. In the mornings were my highest concentrations, which is to be expected. Overall, great product if you need to measure ketones. Starting my keto diet again, but I have a few left over, but will buy again when I run out
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the money. And they seem accurate. I used it when I was doing Keto and it showed me in Ketosis. Then I used it when I had eaten too many carbs and it showed that I was out of Ketosis. That was enough for me to believe that are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, bad strips
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a ketogenic diet where it's very important to be in ketosis. These strips kept showing I wasn't. Someone suggested bad strips do I tried some from CVS and they are much easier to read plus they show I am actually in Keto. Save yourself the trouble and go to your pharmacy and buy them!
customer_reviews.author: txcameragirl

customer_reviews.title: 99.9% accurate,keep me on track!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been doing keto diet for 4 days and once I use the strip, it showed that I’m on a high /large (dark red color) and I tested on my husband (no keto-diet) and it showed yellow color. I trust the product by experimenting and comparing. Worth to try and to keep you on track.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Gray sticks don’t work
customer_reviews.text: This is the second batch in a row I have received that are gray. The indicator is gray and stays gray with no color change. The gray has happened With other brands when they are old, but these are Gray brand new. Bought some other ones at a store and they turned red. These sticks are bogus.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: It works.. healthy diet with no process carbs..and sugar
customer_reviews.text: I am on my day 4... and day 5 I hit Ketosis zone ...cut carb down and keep about 20 grms or less.. I did coffee with coconut oil and butter .. no cream .. and a pack of equal.. delicious and keep me till 1230 my first meal.. 4 eggs omelet and cilantro / garlic and hot sauce .. electrolyte in between and my last meal is 5pm with fish or meat with sautéed veggies .. that’s it and done for my day till next morning ..
customer_reviews.author: Nita Califano

customer_reviews.title: Easy Strips to Use
customer_reviews.text: Started on the keto diet so measuring keytones is super important, just to make sure we were doing it right. These are pretty standard strips you pee on and they turn color. The box comes with a corresponding number with the colors that are pretty easy to read. Im hoping the accuracy is there but I have no basis for comparison so Im going to say they work
customer_reviews.author: Smokeythebandit

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond customer service
customer_reviews.text: It had been a long time since I bought Ketone Test Strips. So long, in fact, I couldn't remember what I used them for in the first place. Now, however, I wanted to test to see if I was in Ketosis as I enjoy the benefits of a high fat diet. The bonus 50 strips for the same price as a pack of 100 allows me to test more often (because I need to know if that new dish I tried has affected me). Nurse Hatty has been in constant communication ready to answer all of my questions and ensure that I was both satisfied with the product, and the ordering process. Will definitely order more from her.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easiest way of Maintaining Ketosis
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quick to show result. It takes a minute to use and obtain results to see if any food intake kicks me out of Ketosis. Pee over the indicating pad end of test strip and wait of 40 seconds to obtain best result. It usually take me 5 seconds to see the test strip results; any purple showing is good enough for me. When I need a more accurate reading I use the blood ketone meter, but that cost a lot more than this easy to use testing.
customer_reviews.author: OLD man

customer_reviews.title: These are nice
customer_reviews.text: I pee on these and they change color. I guess the best thing is they that tell you about the expiration date. I had other strips that kept telling me I was failing ketosis even though I wasn't. Now I realize they were just old. I don't imagine I will ever use another brand. There is a type of this brand that comes with a test bottle. I may use that one if I find I have extra after 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I love these strips they r very accurate and easy to use and read and I’ve tried several other brands these r by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Delise

customer_reviews.title: They Work!!!
customer_reviews.text: These strips are very accurate! I started the keto diet and after two days of being strict with the keto I was showing small amounts of ketones in the urine. After five days of being strict with the diet, I was showing large amounts of ketones in urine. I’m down 4 pounds in 7 days and happy with it. These strips will help guide me to what foods work for me so I can continue to burn fat. The fact that I know my body is in ketosis also helps motivate me not to cheat on my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My second order. Bought this brand and another on Amazon last time and these were by far the most reliable and not one single dud in the can. The other brand had several that would not register correctly. Highly recommend these if you want to be sure the result is correct and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Robo man

customer_reviews.title: Looking for another brand of strips
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product! I test every day. The first time I tried them I had moderate ketones in my urine. Everyday afterwards the stick has become lighter and lighter and now there is no color change at all. I purchased another batch thinking maybe they were expired and still getting no color change. I have not changed my diet and I am still losing weight as well as inches. I just don’t know about this one. I’m trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I believe these strips are accurate, and so much less expensive than blood testing. I’m on the keto diet and I don’t need my results to be so accurate as to justify the $30/mo blood test refills. These strips do the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for about a month and a week until now all tests pop up negative. I know im not just negative because i drink Prüvit Nat & normally it always triggers the pee sticks for 3-5 days after really strong in the large. I’ve always closed the lid as tight as a i can & never touch the test part. 🤷🏼‍♀️ They work though & they’re cheap so can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: The easiest part of keto !
customer_reviews.text: These strips are a lifesaver and confidence booster. I've been doing keto for almost 2 weeks before I got these strips. I was guessing when I was in "ketosis". After getting these strips and the keto guide that comes with it everything is much easier and definite. Would recommend to anyone wanting to measure their levels and do keto right.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These work. I won't lie to you since I am doing keto myself to lose weight and I know how it is when products lie. When I cheated on my keto these strips let me know I was not in ketosis and when I got back on. Remember when you cheat keto it take 3-5 days to get back in. And don't be discouraged it's only water weight.
customer_reviews.author: jessica martinez

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My results don’t really match the color chart, That’s my only complaint. It doesn’t stop me from being able to tell if I’m sorta high, sorta low or negative. I may try another brand, just because this type of product is new to me. But I wouldn’t hesitate to buy them again. My only suggestion to the manufacturer is the chart on the bottle and paper inside and box, slightly very.
customer_reviews.author: Davina King

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for KETO Dieters
customer_reviews.text: These strips are accurate , as the days passed by on my KETO diet I would notice the increase in change of color. As indicated in the instructions I use my cell phone timer after testing to get accurate results . I’m glad I ordered these sticks to see my progress and know my hard work is going to be all worth it in a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Mamibear80s

customer_reviews.title: Great price but that’s it test strips seem to be faulty
customer_reviews.text: My diet is very strict and hasn’t changed in two months . First couple test were you can say similar but all done on the same day .when it came down to testing everyday Three times a day the results were very different the morning showed no ketones and at night i was through the roof . And on top of that I noticed that if I was very well hydrated my ketones were way lower than if I was dehydrated ?? I’ve used other brands and hydration can play a roll but not in a way we’re one says negative and the other day 4.5 ng/dL
customer_reviews.author: jamie  hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Splotchy results that make it impossible to read
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to check on ketone levels while on the Keto Diet. I’ve used numerous of these sticks and the come out splotchy making it impossible to read the actual color. Not sure if I got a defective bottle but I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate
customer_reviews.text: We've been living the keto lifestyle for a while and I know when I'm in ketosis but I wanted to try these test strips to find out how much I am in ketosis. No matter what day, they always say mild. I don't believe they are accurate or perhaps this batch is bad. Either way, too late to return and using a meter would be better than strips.
customer_reviews.author: TL

product_meta.title: Nurse Hatty - Keto Strips – Fresh – USA-Made – High-Performance (150ct. Long Ketone Test Strips)
feature_bullets: FROM NURSE HATTY - I know how important it is for you to receive FRESH Keto Strips for your Diet Plans, so I send a fresh supply of my High-Performance Ketosis strips to Amazon Every Couple of Weeks. With My USA-made Highest Quality ingredients, you get the newest & freshest testing strips. I know you'll love my Ketone Test Strips for confirmation your Ketogenic, Paleo, Low-carb, or Atkins Diet is working, or you need to tweak your diet to reach urine ketosis.

The MOST SUREFIRE WAY to make sure your strips are ACCURATE is to purchase Ketone Script 100ct. with the LIQUID KETONE TEST SOLUTION CONTROL (see 100 COUNT on this listing). Don't Guess if your Strips are Reliable. Know for sure BEFORE YOU TEST YOUR KETONES! Also, as my NEW STABILIZED REAGENT LASTS A FULL 90 DAYS, this product has extensive clinical and laboratory testing with Approval for Efficacy & Safety by in-house quality controls.

100 Strips + GET 50 STRIPS FREE! I know how often you need to check for Ketones (Dieters 1-2 a day, and others more often), so I included an extra 50 in every bottle for the same price as 100 pee strips (Total 150 LOOSE Strips). A sealed bottle has a 2-year shelf life, but once opened, it lasts for 90 days. But, if you are EVER unhappy with my product, please email me via Amazon, so I can take care of you immediately!

DON'T WANT TO GET YOUR FINGERS WET? Me neither! Ketone Script has a 4.2 INCHES LONG STRIP LENGTH so you can be sure your fingers don't get wet sampling from your urine stream. Disclaimer - Ketone Script can only monitor the formation of Ketone concentration in one's urine and is not a cure, remedy, or treatment of any weight loss program.
